articles.title: Mont. boy, 13, suffers COVID-19 symptoms, including heart problems, for months - WIS10
articles.description: The 13-year-old contracted COVID-19 in November. He hasn’t been to school since and continues to experience symptoms, many severe, from the illness.
articles.content: MISSOULA, Mont. (KECI) - Months after contracting COVID-19, a 13-year-old boy from Montana is considered a long-hauler, as he continues to experience symptoms from the illness, including heart issues… [+2742 chars]
